dcterms:description: A dataset containing dermoscopic images of skin lesions, used for the analysis and classification of skin lesions, particularly for melanoma detection.
dcterms:title: Skin Lesion Dataset (ISIC 2019 and ISIC 2020)

dcterms:creator: Seán Lynch
dcterms:description: An open dataset providing information on plastic pollution, allowing users to contribute and access data on litter.
dcterms:title: Open Litter Map Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset used to analyze the recidivism risk of offenders, highlighting potential biases in predictive policing.
dcterms:title: ProPublica’s General Recidivism Risk Scale Dataset

dcterms:creator: William Dieterich
Christina Mendoza
Tim Brennan
dcterms:description: A dataset containing risk scales for assessing recidivism, demonstrating issues of accuracy and fairness in predictive algorithms.
dcterms:title: Northpointe Inc. Research Department Dataset

dcterms:creator: Pedro F Proença
Pedro Simões
dcterms:description: A dataset providing annotations for litter detection, aimed at improving environmental monitoring and awareness.
dcterms:title: TACO Dataset
